page.title: 09 SPORT & LEISURE, FOLKESTONE
page.content: 'Sport for Everyone' is the slogan for 1985 at the Folkestone Sports Centre. The centre boasts a variety of activities available to residents and visitors: Badminton,Golf,Squash,Karate, Skiing,Gymnastics,Weight Training, Volleyball,Table Tennis,Tennis,Roller Dance,Basketball and Roller Skating. It also has a sauna and solarium. Swimming is catered for by two pools,one at the Sports Centre, the other at Hythe. Within the town there are leagues for Crib,Darts,Boxing,Bowls,Football, Cricket,Tennis and Rugby. Other sports available include: Rowing,Sailing and Windsurfing, for which there are thriving clubs, and Hang Gliding, which takes place along the Downs to the north of the town.
